articles.title: Banks receive over 19 lakh UPI IPO applications in June - Entrackr
articles.description: Remitter banks in India received over 19 lakh or 1.95 million IPO applications or mandates created that have chosen UPI as the payment option while filling the application in June, data released by the National Payments Corporation of India shows. According t…
